update_interval.tooltip: Interval in which applet will check if there was change in network interfaces. Can be frequent.

update_interval_service.tooltip: Interval in which applet will fire get request to one of IP Services. Don't make it too frequent for not overloading servers.

debugger.tooltip: For debugging purposes. Higher level means more logs in ~/.cinnamon/glass.log

home_isp.default: Use your isp name from here: http://www.telize.com/geoip
home_isp.tooltip: Fill out your home ISP. If the ISP from telize.com will match with this value, home icon will be used instead of country flag.

home_isp_icon-name.description: The icon to used for home ISP:
home_isp_icon-name.tooltip: Select an icon file, or you can type an icon name into the entry box

home_isp_nickname.tooltip: Text to show in tooltip when this ISP is active

other1_isp.default: Use your isp name from here: http://www.telize.com/geoip
